{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Accton |model=WA5001 |revision= |fcc_date=11/07/2001 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=HEDACCWA5001 |ic_id= |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC8245;XPC8245LZU266A; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F640J3A-120 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC2M32B2-6 D |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, DE-9,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5210A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5110 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=National Semiconductor |eth_chip2_model=DP83815 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=a |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:04:E2 |oui_eth=00:04:E2 }} {{TagLine|802.11a Wireless Access Point}}
This device uses the [[Atheros AR5BAP-00030]] (AP30) reference design. :The default SSID is ''ANY''. See also [[Accton]]..
The power adapter included with the device is a :'''Cincon Electronics''' TR25033 (3.3V, 4.0A).
